pages.title: Cooling
pages.text: $(bold)COST: $(spell) + $(#4882B4)Ice$()$(br2)$(bold)MAX LEVEL:$() $(#green)1$()$(br2)$(bold)XP COST:$() $(#green)10$()$(br2)$(italic)''A simple casting spell, this will put out fire on blocks or entities or un-light blocks that are Lit (e.g. Campfires).''$()

When casting $(#4882B4)$(bold)Cooling$(), a freezing spell projectile will be thrown from your scroll.$(br2)Upon the projectile striking an entity, it will put out any flame that may surround them.$(br2)When striking a block, if it is lit or on fire, the $(#4882B4)$(bold)Cooling$() hit from your spell will put it out in a second!$(br2)$(bold)Tip: $(italic)The scroll is a one-time use.$()
